attributes.action: Dual the A2 between Lydden and Dover Port.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most of the A2 is already dualled, apart from this section.
Traffic now regularly queues on the M20-A20, Dualling the A2 would give cars another option to Dover, leaving lorries to queue on the M20-A20.
This would save time, slow down pollution on queueing vehicles and hopefully stop some of the accidents.
Dover and the U.K. needs this upgrade. Please support this common sence issue.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Dual the A2 between Lydden and Dover Port."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15204.asp

Prime Minister's Office
